item.title: Shoot House
item.description: Shoot House A bulk of this team graduated in 2020 amidst the Corona Virus pandemic and in the middle of quarantine. As a result, many of us were caught in a vicious market with little guidance on how to proceed forward. That was until Vandalia Range and Armory approached our game design professor with a proposition. They wanted to hire a team of developers to create better games for their range.
